short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly add and organize bookmarks within YouTube videos for easy access and sharing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you often find yourself wishing you could easily mark and return to your favorite moments within YouTube videos? Introducing MarkTube, the ultimate tool to enhance your YouTube experience by allowing you to effortlessly add  bookmarks within videos.

Key Features:

- Add Bookmarks with Ease

- Quickly add bookmarks to any YouTube video with just a click.

- Precisely mark moments within videos that you find important or interesting.
